message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CY 

This paper is about Neural Machine Translation (NMT) and specifically focuses on the challenge of idiom translation. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves the use of machine learning algorithms, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves experimentation with NMT models, which could place it in cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper involves the creation of a new data set, which could also place it in cs.CY (Computers and Society).
